participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

parent_rules_q1.Description: Which statement best describes the rules for your child's drinking in your house? / ¿Cuál de las siguientes afirmaciones describe mejor las reglas que debe seguir su niño(a) con respecto al consumo de alcohol en su casa? | 1 = My child is not allowed to drink under any circumstances  / Mi niño(a) no tiene permitido beber bajo ninguna circunstancia; 2 = My child is allowed to drink at home but only on special occasions and under parent supervision / Mi niño(a) tiene permitido beber en casa; 3 = My child can have a drink when he/she asks for one  /Mi niño(a) puede tomar una copa cuando pide una; 4 = My child can drink at home whenever he/she wants to / Mi niño(a) puede beber en casa cuando lo desee; 5 = I don't set rules about my child's drinking / No le pongo reglas a mi niño(a) con respecto al consumo de alcohol; 6 = I haven't made rules yet about my child drinking   /Todavía no le he puesto reglas a mi niño(a) con respecto al consumo de alcohol

Levels.1: My child is not allowed to drink under any circumstances  / Mi niño(a) no tiene permitido beber bajo ninguna circunstancia
Levels.2: My child is allowed to drink at home but only on special occasions and under parent supervision / Mi niño(a) tiene permitido beber en casa
Levels.3: My child can have a drink when he/she asks for one  /Mi niño(a) puede tomar una copa cuando pide una
Levels.4: My child can drink at home whenever he/she wants to / Mi niño(a) puede beber en casa cuando lo desee
Levels.5: I don't set rules about my child's drinking / No le pongo reglas a mi niño(a) con respecto al consumo de alcohol
Levels.6: I haven't made rules yet about my child drinking   /Todavía no le he puesto reglas a mi niño(a) con respecto al consumo de alcohol

parent_rules_q1a.Description: Are these the same rules for all family members? /Estas reglas son las mismas para todos los miembros de la familia? | 1 = No, applies only to children, not teen or adults; 2 = No, applies only to children and teen, not adults; 3 = Yes

Levels.1: No, applies only to children, not teen or adults
Levels.2: No, applies only to children and teen, not adults

parent_rules_q2.Description: Do you have penalties for violating family rules about drinking?? / ¿Tiene sanciones establecidas por no respetar las reglas familiares con respecto al consumo de alcohol? | 1 = Yes /Sí; 0 = No

parent_rules_q3.Description: Are these rules enforced? / ¿Se  hacen cumplir estas reglas? | 0 = No; 1 = Yes /Sí; 4 = I have not had to enforce these rules /No he tenido que hacer cumplir estas reglas

Levels.4: I have not had to enforce these rules /No he tenido que hacer cumplir estas reglas

parent_rules_q4.Description: What are the family rules about smoking cigarettes for your son/daughter? / ¿Cuáles son las reglas familiares que debe seguir su niño(a) con respecto a fumar cigarrillos? | 1 = Not allowed to smoke under any circumstances /No tiene permitido fumar bajo ninguna circunstancia; 2 = Not allowed to smoke in home - no family rules outside home /No tiene permitido fumar en casa; no hay reglas familiares con respecto a fumar fuera de la casa; 3 = Allowed to smoke in designated areas at home Tiene permitido fumar en /áreas designadas de la casa; 4 = Allowed to smoke anywhere /Tiene permitido fumar donde sea; 5 = I don't set rules about smoking cigarettes /No le pongo reglas con respecto a fumar cigarrillos; 6 = I haven't made rules yet about my child smoking cigarettes /Todavía no le he puesto reglas a mi niño(a) con respecto a fumar cigarrillos

Levels.1: Not allowed to smoke under any circumstances /No tiene permitido fumar bajo ninguna circunstancia
Levels.2: Not allowed to smoke in home - no family rules outside home /No tiene permitido fumar en casa
Levels.3: Allowed to smoke in designated areas at home Tiene permitido fumar en /áreas designadas de la casa
Levels.4: Allowed to smoke anywhere /Tiene permitido fumar donde sea
Levels.5: I don't set rules about smoking cigarettes /No le pongo reglas con respecto a fumar cigarrillos
Levels.6: I haven't made rules yet about my child smoking cigarettes /Todavía no le he puesto reglas a mi niño(a) con respecto a fumar cigarrillos

parent_rules_q5.Description: Are these the same rules for all family members? /Estas reglas son las mismas para todos los miembros de la familia? | 1 = No, applies only to children, not teen or adults; 2 = No, applies only to children and teen, not adults; 3 = Yes

Levels.1: No, applies only to children, not teen or adults
Levels.2: No, applies only to children and teen, not adults

parent_rules_q6.Description: Do you enforce penalties for violating family rules about smoking? /¿Aplica sanciones por no respetar las reglas familiares con respecto a fumar cigarrillos? | 0 = Never /Nunca; 1 = Rarely/ Rara vez; 2 = Sometimes /A veces; 3 = Often/ Con frecuencia; 4 = I have not had to enforce these rules /No he tenido que hacer que cumplan estas reglas

Levels.4: I have not had to enforce these rules /No he tenido que hacer que cumplan estas reglas

parent_rules_q7.Description: What are the family rules about using marijuana for your son/daughter? /¿Cuáles son las reglas familiares que debe seguir su niño(a) con respecto al consumo de marihuana? | 1 = Not allowed to use marijuana under any circumstances /No tiene permitido consumir marihuana bajo ninguna circunstancia; 2 = Not allowed to use marijuana in home - no family rules outside home /No tiene permitido consumir marihuana en casa; no hay reglas familiares con respecto al consumo de marihuana fuera de la casa; 3 = Allowed to use marijuana in home with permission /Tiene permitido consumir marihuana en casa; 4 = Allowed to use marijuana in home whenever he/she wants /Tiene permitido consumir marihuana en casa cuando lo desee; 5 = I don't set rules about marijuana use /No pongo reglas con respecto al consumo de marihuana; 6 = I haven't made rules yet about my child's marijuana use T/odavía no le he puesto reglas a mi niño(a) con respecto al consumo de marihuana

Levels.1: Not allowed to use marijuana under any circumstances /No tiene permitido consumir marihuana bajo ninguna circunstancia
Levels.2: Not allowed to use marijuana in home - no family rules outside home /No tiene permitido consumir marihuana en casa
Levels.3: Allowed to use marijuana in home with permission /Tiene permitido consumir marihuana en casa
Levels.4: Allowed to use marijuana in home whenever he/she wants /Tiene permitido consumir marihuana en casa cuando lo desee
Levels.5: I don't set rules about marijuana use /No pongo reglas con respecto al consumo de marihuana
Levels.6: I haven't made rules yet about my child's marijuana use T/odavía no le he puesto reglas a mi niño(a) con respecto al consumo de marihuana

parent_rules_q8.Description: Are these the same rules for all family members? / ¿Estas reglas son las mismas para todos los miembros de la familia? | 1 = No, applies only to children, not teen or adults; 2 = No, applies only to children and teen, not adults; 3 = Yes

Levels.1: No, applies only to children, not teen or adults
Levels.2: No, applies only to children and teen, not adults

parent_rules_q9.Description: Do you enforce penalties for violating family rules about using marijuana? /¿Aplica sanciones por no respetar las reglas familiares sobre el consumo de marihuana? | 0 = Never /Nunca; 1 = Rarely/ Rara vez; 2 = Sometimes /A veces; 3 = Often/ Con frecuencia; 4 = I have not had to enforce these rules /No he tenido que hacer que cumplan estas reglas

Levels.4: I have not had to enforce these rules /No he tenido que hacer que cumplan estas reglas

parent_rules_q_10.Description: What are the family rules about using electronic nicotine or vaping products | 1=Not allowed to use electronic nicotine products under any circumstances ; 2=Not allowed to use electronic nicotine products in home - no family rules outside home ; 3=Allowed to use electronic nicotine products in designated areas at home ; 4=Allowed to use electronic nicotine products anywhere ; 5=I don't set rules about using electronic nicotine products ; 6=I haven't made rules yet about my child using electronic nicotine products

Levels.1: Not allowed to use electronic nicotine products under any circumstances
Levels.2: Not allowed to use electronic nicotine products in home - no family rules outside home
Levels.3: Allowed to use electronic nicotine products in designated areas at home
Levels.4: Allowed to use electronic nicotine products anywhere
Levels.5: I don't set rules about using electronic nicotine products
Levels.6: I haven't made rules yet about my child using electronic nicotine products

parent_rules_q_11.Description: Are these the same rules for all family members? | 1=No=applies only to children=not teen or adults ; 2=No=applies only to children and teen=not adult ; 3=Yes=applies to everyone

parent_rules_q_12.Description: Do you enforce penalties for violating family rules about using electronic nicotine or vaping products? | 0=Never ; 1=Rarely  ; 2=Sometimes ; 3=Often ; 4=I have not had to enforce these rules

Levels.4: I have not had to enforce these rules
